entries.message:
ValidationError: 'some organization, schema TBD' is not of type 'object'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['schema:affiliation']:
    {'$schema': 'https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema',
     'allOf': [{'required': ['@type']},
               {'anyOf': [{'required': ['schema:name']},
                          {'required': ['schema:identifier']}]}],
     'properties': {'@id': {'type': 'string'},
                    '@type': {'default': 'schema:Organization',
                              'enum': ['schema:Organization',
                                       'schema:FundingAgency',
                                       'schema:Consortium',
                                       'schema:Corporation',
                                       'schema:EducationalOrganization',
                                       'schema:FundingScheme',
                                       'schema:GovernmentOrganization',
                                       'schema:NGO',
                                       'schema:Project',
                                       'schema:ResearchOrganization'],
                              'type': 'string'},
                    'schema:alternateName': {'description': 'other labels '
                                                            'by which the '
                                                            'organization '
                                                            'might be '
                                                            'known',
                                             'type': 'string'},
                    'schema:description': {'type': 'string'},
                    'schema:identifier': {'anyOf': [{'$ref': 'https://smrgeoinfo.github.io/OCGbuildingBlockTest/build/annotated/bbr/test/properties/identifier/schema.yaml'},
                                                    {'type': 'string'}],
                                          'description': 'identifier for '
                                                         'organization'},
                    'schema:name': {'description': 'string label for '
                                                   'organization that is '
                                                   'meaningful for human '
                                                   'users',
                                    'type': 'string'},
                    'schema:sameAs': {'description': 'other identifiers '
                                                     'for the organization',
                                      'items': {'type': 'string'},
                                      'type': 'array'}},
     'type': 'object',
     'x-jsonld-extra-terms': {'schema': 'https://schema.org'}}

On instance['schema:affiliation']:
